TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DocumentPaginator extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供支持从单个文档创建多页元素的抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class that supports creation of multiple-page elements from a single document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你需要以响应事件，例如更改的页大小的自动后台重新分页，然后使用作为基类。If you need automatic background repagination in response to events such as changing the page size of a , then use as your base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`userState`是`null`，则所有异步任务将被取消。If `userState` is `null`, then all asynchronous tasks are cancelled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该方法的此重载使可以取消此异步操作不会取消所有异步操作。This overload of the method makes it possible to cancel this asynchronous operation without cancelling all asynchronous operations. 此方法将引发事件。This method raises the event. 作为事件自变量之一传递到事件。The is passed to the event as one of the event arguments. 以下步骤说明了如何检索以异步方式：The following steps illustrate how to retrieve a asynchronously: 1. 创建委托并将其接收的通知添加事件。Create a delegate and add it to be notified of events. 2. 调用指定`pageNumber`需以及唯一`userState`，它将用来标识完成的异步事件。Call specifying the `pageNumber` desired and a unique `userState`, which will be used to identify the completion of the asynchronous event. 3. 当发生该事件时，会调用的委托，两个比较事件的。When the event occurs and the delegate is called, compare the event's . 与原始属性`userState`参数。property with the original `userState` parameter. ( 。(The . 属性还将匹配`pageNumber`中指定调用。)property will also match the `pageNumber` specified in the call.) 4. 当。When the . 属性与匹配原始 `userState`、 操作已完成和页已准备就绪。property matches the original `userState`, the operation is complete and the page is ready. 5. 调用检索格式化。Call to retrieve the formatted .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PageCount As Integer
public: abstract property int PageCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取当前已设置格式的页数的计数。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a count of the number of pages currently formatted

value.span: 已设置格式的页数的计数。

span.span: A count of the number of pages that have been formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，分页已完成和是文档中的页面的总数。If is `true`, pagination is complete and is the total number of pages in the document. 如果是`false`，正在进行中的分页和为当前已设置格式的页数 （不总数）。If is `false`, pagination is in process and is the number of pages currently formatted (not the total). 如果此值可能会更改或内容发生更改，因为这些事件会强制进行重新分页。This value may change if or content changes, because those events would force a repagination.

summary.span: 在文档内容改变时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the document content is changed.
